comments.body: why doesn't this one get a contextual signature too?

This is a test capturing [this change](https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/pull/42620#issuecomment-773558828) I describe from DT - that comment contains the explanation, and is the bulk of what I was trying to discuss at the design meeting.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@        field: {
            validate: (_t, _p, _s) => false,
            normalize: match => match.x,
                       ~~~~~
!!! error TS7006: Parameter 'match' implicitly has an 'any' type.
